TestDescriptor.Name: Inheritance Regression testing#1
TestDescriptor.Author: Arnaud Blandin
TestDescriptor.Comment: Given the following situation: a class A maps to the xml-name "tagA", a class B EXTENDS the Class A. When setting in A an object B, Castor should put the tag name to "tagA" and output the relevant 'xsi-type' information. (No auto-naming used)
